_json.title: Authentic Christianity: Trading Religion and Rules for True Faith
_json.gridTitle: Authentic Christianity: Trading Religion and Rules for True Faith
_json.description: Is there a particular church or creed that's right? Why do Christians sometimes seem fake? How can I know that I'm a true follower of Jesus? Ray C. Stedman gets back to basics in his classic bestseller Authentic Christianity, taking you to the heart of the gospel with the reminder that it is all about Jesus living in you. When Christ is the center, your life revolves around Himand everything else comes into proper focus.     True Christianity is more than a set of beliefs--it is a way
